Scripts.OnClick: if TurtleRPSettings["bgs"] == "off" then TurtleRPSettings["bgs"] = "on" else TurtleRPSettings["bgs"] = "off" end
if TurtleRPSettings["tray"] == "0" then TurtleRPSettings["tray"] = "1" TurtleRP_IconTray:Show() else TurtleRPSettings["tray"] = "0" TurtleRP_IconTray:Hide() end
if TurtleRPSettings["name_size"] == "0" then TurtleRPSettings["name_size"] = "1" else TurtleRPSettings["name_size"] = "0" end

if TurtleRPSettings["minimap_icon_size"] == "0" then TurtleRPSettings["minimap_icon_size"] = "1" TurtleRP_MinimapIcon_OpenAdmin:SetScale(1.25) else TurtleRPSettings["minimap_icon_size"] = "0" TurtleRP_MinimapIcon_OpenAdmin:SetScale(1) end

if TurtleRPSettings["hide_minimap_icon"] == "0" then TurtleRPSettings["hide_minimap_icon"] = "1" TurtleRP_MinimapIcon:Hide() else TurtleRPSettings["hide_minimap_icon"] = "0" TurtleRP_MinimapIcon:Show() end
if TurtleRPSettings["share_location"] == "0" then TurtleRPSettings["share_location"] = "1" else TurtleRPSettings["share_location"] = "0" end TurtleRP.pingWithLocationAndVersion("P")
